snippet: Over good wine and suckling pig, all politics is local.
abstract: Mira Kamdar Editorial Observer describes fractious debate held between guests at a meal in Sardinia about Italian politics and the future of the island; underscores fact that many Sardinians feel estranged from their unique homeland and culture due to their dependence on the Italian mainland and Europe.
lead_paragraph: Over good wine and suckling pig, all politics is local.

headline.print_headline: Around a Sardinian Table, a Fractious Debate
headline.main: Around a Sardinian Table, a Fractious Debate
